data.title: EXCLUSIVE! Hiten Tejwani opens up about working with wife Gauri Pradhan
data.meta_description: The actor will be next seen in the music video titled Mera Pyara Hindustan. | Tellychakkar.com
data.text:
MUMBAI: Popular television actor Hiten Tejwani in a candid chat with Tellychakkar.com, talks about his upcoming music video Mera Pyara Hindustan and working with his wife Gauri Pradhan.

The actor was questioned about when his fans can see him working with his wife Gauri Pradhan on screen. The actor was happy to answer the question. Talking about the same, he reveals that he works on the projects that interest him. But his wife is very choosy about doing anything on screen. He also said that they are open to taking up the characters which are different and which they have not done before on screen.

Also read: EXCLUSIVE: “The show explores the different psychic behaviours of a person” Hiten Tejwani on his upcoming show Games of Karma

Further adding to the same, the actor said there are many good stories now a days on the OTT platforms. If something great comes to them, which Gauri likes to do it and even him, then definitely their fans can see them together on screen.

On the work front, the actor will be seen wearing an Army uniform in the upcoming music video titled Mera Pyara Hindustan. In the video, he will be seen with actress Heena Varde. The music video is directed by Mehul Agaja and produced by Jakir Juneja and Faraz Rauma. The lyrics are written and composed by Kausar Jamot and sung by Romy. The video will be released under the banner of Affix Music Company.

Well, we are eager to see the popular couple coming together on screen and gracing their fans. What do you think, do let us know in the comments.

For more news and updates on Television, Digital, and Bollywood, stay tuned to TellyChakkar.
